mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) AS `count`, DATE_FORMAT(class_begin_time, '%Y%m%d') AS `day` FROM `jljs_class_record` where del_flag = '0' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(class_begin_time, '%Y%m%d') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(class_begin_time, '%Y%m%d') ASC

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(member_name) AS memberName, birth_day AS birthDay, REPLACE(birth_day, '/', IF(LENGTH(SUBSTRING_INDEX(birth_day, '/', -1)) < 2, '0', '')) AS sort FROM `jljs_member_info` t1 WHERE t1.del_flag = '0' AND birth_day IS NOT NULL GROUP BY birth_day ORDER BY CAST(sort AS UNSIGNED)
